nushi_dragon_0020_friend_01: [VAR TRNAME(0000)]! Did you find the Titan?![VAR 0114(0006)]
nushi_dragon_0020_friend_02:
So that’s it? Sure is one big...uh...dragon?\c
Wait, is it even a dragon? Or is it a fish?![VAR 0114(0006)]
nushi_dragon_0020_friend_05: Th-the little sushi guy got eaten up by the Titan?![VAR 0114(0006)]
nushi_dragon_0020_friend_06:
Yeesh! Didn’t expect to see the food chain in
action today![VAR 0114(0006)]
nushi_dragon_0020_friend_09:
Now that the Titan’s taken care of, next up on
the menu is that Herba Mystica...[VAR 0114(0006)]
nushi_dragon_0020_friend_11:
Whoa! The little sushi guy escaped without
becoming that thing’s lunch![VAR 0114(0006)]
nushi_dragon_0020_friend_12: What—?! Does that thing wanna fight, too?![VAR 0114(0006)]
